==German== {{cardinalbox|de|14|15|16|vierzehn|sechzehn|ord=fünfzehnte}} ===Alternative forms=== Colloquial forms are * {{l|de|fuffzehn}} {{IPAchar|[ˈfʊftseːn]|lang=de}} in northern and central Germany; * {{l|de|fuchzehn}} {{IPAchar|[ˈfʊxtseːn]|lang=de}} in southern Germany and Austria. These forms are frequent in pronunciation, but rare in writing, the more so as numerals above 12 are usually not written out in German texts. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈfʏnftseːn/}} * {{audio|de|De-fünfzehn.ogg|audio}} ===Numeral=== {{head|de|numeral}} # [[fifteen]] ====Coordinate terms==== {{de-cardinal}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|fünf}} * {{l|de|zehn}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} [[Category:German cardinal numbers]]
